wikitext.*:
[[File:The Lord of the Rings Online - Great West Road.jpg|thumb|250px|Great West Road running past [[Min-Rimmon]] and [[Calenhad]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'']]
The '''Great West Road''',<ref name=RKMap>{{RK|Map}}, label "Great West Road" above the road in the Eastfold</ref> also referred to as the '''West Road'''<ref>{{RK|Debate}}, p. 882</ref><ref name=Index>{{UT|Index}}, entry ''Roads'' (2) (i)</ref> or the '''horse-road'''<ref name=Index/><ref name=Isen>{{UT|Isen}}, tenth paragraph</ref> was the name of the portion of the '''[[Great Road]]'''<ref>{{UT|Eorl}}</ref> between the eastern shore of the [[Fords of Isen]]<ref name=Index/> and the [[Forannest|north gate]] of the [[Rammas Echor]]<ref name=UI>{{HM|UI}}, entry ''North-way'', p. 635</ref><ref name=Gate>{{HM|UI}}, entry ''north gate'', p. 559</ref> north of [[Minas Tirith]].

==Course==
The Great West Road ran from the eastern shore of the Fords of Isen straight east for approximately two miles, then bent sharply to the south-east<ref name=Isen/> and ran across [[Calenardhon]]/[[Rohan]] roughly parallel to the northern side of the [[White Mountains]] through the [[Westfold]] where it met the [[Deeping-road]] that ran north-east from [[Helm's Deep]],<ref>{{FR|Map}}</ref> continued through the [[Folde]] on to [[Edoras]] , then through the [[Eastfold]] across the [[Mering Stream]] into [[Anórien]] where it ran through the northern part of the [[Firienholt|Firien Wood]] and along the northern edge of [[Drúadan Forest]] to the northern side of [[Amon Dîn]] where it turned further to the south-east until it reached the north gate of the Rammas Echor in the north of Minas Tirith.<ref name=RKMap/>

The road from the Gate of Minas Tirith to the north gate of the Rammas Echor to join the Great West Road<ref name=UI/><ref name=Gate/> was called the '''North-way'''.<ref>{{RK|Steward}}, pp. 969 and 972</ref>

The part of the Great Road that ran from the western shore of the Fords of Isen to [[Fornost Erain]] was called the '''North Road''' and later called the '''[[Greenway]]''' by the [[Bree-folk]].<ref>{{HM|UI}}, entry ''Greenway'', "originally running from Isengard to Fornost", p. 31</ref><ref>{{FR|Sign}}, p. 150</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''2007: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:The entire length of the Great West Road can be followed in the game.
